bill_title: revise provisions regarding bond for persons charged with certain crimes involving methamphetamine.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise provisions regarding bond for persons charged with certain crimes involving methamphetamine. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 23A-43 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: In any bond hearing for any person who is charged with manufacturing, distributing, or dispensing methamphetamine; possessing with intent to manufacture, distribute, or dispense methamphetamine; creating or distributing a counterfeit of methamphetamine; or possessing methamphetamine with intent to distribute, there is a rebuttable presumption that the person charged is a threat to the community and a possible flight risk. 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.038 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
